item.title: 2 major problems!
item.dc:creator: @zooyork_2727 zooyork 2727
item.description:
@zooyork_2727 wrote:

to change attack rate/speed search for PkingDelay = in your client.java and change the number after the “=”. the number stands for how many seconds in between each attack.

Read full topic
